import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { faAngular, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './index.scss' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { return () => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') } , 4000) } }, []) return ( <>

Hello and welcome to my portfolio! I am a passionate and dedicated individual currently pursuing a dual degree in Computer Science and Biochemistry at California State University, East Bay (CSUEB). This unique combination of disciplines reflects my fascination with both the intricate world of code and the complexities of biological systems. Throughout my academic journey, I have cultivated a diverse skill set that allows me to bridge the gap between these two seemingly disparate fields, finding innovative solutions where they intersect.

In the realm of computer science, I have honed my programming prowess through coursework and personal projects. From crafting efficient algorithms to developing user-friendly applications, I thrive on the challenges that coding presents. Simultaneously, my studies in biochemistry have fueled my curiosity for understanding the molecular underpinnings of life. Whether it's unraveling the secrets of DNA or exploring the intricacies of biochemical pathways, I am driven by a relentless pursuit of knowledge in both scientific and technological domains.

As I navigate the dynamic landscape of academia, I am committed to leveraging my interdisciplinary background to contribute meaningfully to the ever-evolving intersection of computer science and biochemistry. Through this portfolio, I invite you to explore the projects and experiences that have shaped my academic journey and to join me on this exciting exploration of the nexus between code and molecules.

) } export default About
